thread.title: Judge fights back tears as he jails twisted couple for raping two young girls and forcing them to eat their own vomit in horrific abuse case
thread.title_full: Judge fights back tears as he jails twisted couple for raping two young girls and forcing them to eat their own vomit in horrific abuse case

author: Neal Baker
title: Judge fights back tears as he jails twisted couple for raping two young girls and forcing them to eat their own vomit in horrific abuse case
text:
Opinion 'UTTERLY INHUMAN' Judge fights back tears as he jails twisted couple for raping two young girls and forcing them to eat their own vomit in horrific abuse case 
Evil pair carried out campaign of degrading torture and abuse on their child victims from the when they were just eight By NEAL BAKER
